question_text: What is the key reason SO-DIMMs are used in laptops instead of full-size DIMMs?
answer_options: Their smaller size fits compact laptop layouts
They include built-in error correction by default
correct_answer: Their smaller size fits compact laptop layouts
explanation: SO-DIMMs (Small Outline DIMMs) are about half the size of full DIMMs and are designed to fit the limited internal space of laptops and mobile devices.
